title: Avenge the Hag Survivors
content:

Avenge the Hag Survivors Objectives

Search for the hag.

We disposed of a hag spy named Jatlo. Cold comfort for the hag's victims, who believe her to be in the city, and who want her gone.

Confront Auntie Ethel.

We learned that Captain Grisly is none other than Auntie Ethel. She flew to the cellar - time to end this.

Kill the hag once and for all.

Hunting the hag into her lair, we stand face to face. In order to
